pages.text: $(l)(Active-Defensive)/$$(br)Sea Mines are deployed on your own board $(l)on unknown tiles/$. When they are hit, they will damage a few random opponent tiles. Each sea mine has one stat: Amount. It determines how many tiles are damaged when the sea mine is hit.

$(l)Tips & Tricks:/$$(li)When sea mines hits an $(l:abilities/passive/energy_shield)$(thing)Energy Shield/$, it will only deal one damage to the shield regardless of how much of the ability hit the shield.$(li)Try to place sea mines where you think the opponent will fire, such as close to a damaged ship.

$(li)Sea mines must be placed on unknown tiles, meaning that any tile that has already been damaged is not valid. $(l)If you ignore this and still try to place a sea mine on a known tile, then nothing happens and the ability is wasted./$$(li)Don't place sea mines on occupied tiles, as the ability will be wasted.
